description.value:
Your arcane aptitude grows as you learn how to better entrance an audience with magic. Choose one 1st-rank spell from the following list: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Glow Up], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Illusory Disguise], or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Ventriloquism]. You can cast this spell as an arcane innate spell once per day.

Special You can select this feat more than once. If you do, you must select a different spell.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
